key_risks: Financial instability with consistent losses and reliance on external funding
Technological competition from cheaper renewable energy solutions
Regulatory dependency on government incentives and subsidies
Risk of Nasdaq delisting due to non-compliance with minimum bid price requirement
High market volatility and speculative investor sentiment
controversies: Persistent shareholder dilution due to equity offerings
Significant restructuring efforts including job cuts
environmental_issues: Reliance on specialized materials and components vulnerable to supply chain disruptions
social_issues: Mixed investor sentiment due to stock volatility and financial instability
governance_issues: Potential short-term disruptions from restructuring efforts
